permissions: Authorized via ProjectMarginMatrixPolicy delegated to the related project; users must be allowed to create/update the associated project per ProjectPolicy (e.g., admins or practically managers of the project developer organization).
side_effects: Creates a project margin matrix and schedules an async scenario build job after commit; scenarios are populated/updated later.
validation_notes: Required: --project. Only one project margin matrix per project (project_id must be unique).
